    • Method Detail

      • createCardHelper

        public static CardHelper createCardHelper(android.content.Context context,
                                          CcidReader reader,
                                          CardInfo info)
        Creates a CardHelper for a card. This helper can be used to read the card.
        Parameters:
        context - the Context of the calling component
        reader - the CcidReader associated to the card
        info - the CardInfo associated to the card
        Returns:
        a CardHelper or a generic helper if there is no helper available for the card

      • getErrorCode

        public int getErrorCode()
        Returns the last occurred error. Use this method if a reading operation failed.

      • getCcidReader

        public CcidReader getCcidReader()
        Returns the CcidReader associated to this helper.
        Returns:
        the CcidReader

      • readCardInfo

        public CardInfo readCardInfo()
        Reads the info of a card synchronously.
        Returns:
        the CardInfo or null if the reading failed.

      • readCardInfo

        public void readCardInfo(CardHelper.ReadCardInfoAsyncListener listener)
        Reads the info of a card asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        listener -
